website_summaries.verdict: A longtime trusted brand that won't disappoint.
pros: African Pride's braid sheen will keep your hair looking fresh
Not only that, but it also works wonders on wigs, weaves, and other kinds of extensions
cons: Contains parabens, which  have been linked to hair damage

customer_reviews.title: It's green!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is terrible! It's bright green. It stained my clothes green. Do not buy this! I was told to use this for American Girl doll hair and no. Don't use it for that! I had to wash the green out of the doll's hair and it stained the shirt she was wearing green as well. Avoid this stuff at all costs and if you're looking for a spray for dollies, use Synthetic Wig Conditioning Spray or the African Pride braid spray at Walmart. Both are clear and way better than this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone..
customer_reviews.text: I thought this spray worked great until I took my style down. I used this product to moisturize my hair while wearing box braids. While wearing the style the spray definitely provided moisture to my scalp. However my hair felt very dry once I took the style down. I may have kept the style in for too long which could've contributed to my hair feeling dry. However I've tried other products while protective styling for the same length of time (1 month) and did not experience the same outcome. This product isn't terrible. I would just advise to be mindful that this product could possibly lead to dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this spray and will be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Bottle looks Different
customer_reviews.text: The bottle I received says braid sheen, but it's a brown bottle and doesn't look like the bottle I ordered. I'll try it.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Itch Relief
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great at removing the itch from my scalp after getting my hair braided. I paired it with Jamaican black castor oil and my hair felt amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Cort

customer_reviews.title: Hair product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to donate to a woman's shelter so I haven't tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Stegman

customer_reviews.title: Best braid spray yet, and we’ve tried a few!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and the shine it gives my daughter’s yarn braids!
customer_reviews.author: Jboots

customer_reviews.title: Item came broken and destroyed
customer_reviews.text: The bottle came chipped and broken in the cap area making it spill all over the package. Pissed at the fact that I had to maneuver this just to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa P.

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: It streams out instead of sprays. It's like water instead of hair sheen.It is almost as if someone replaced half the product with water. I’ve used this product before and this is not it. Do not order from Amazon. Just but in store.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Be warned of stains
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other reviews, this product did stain my nails and shirt. With that being said I do like the product itself just not the only fact that it leaves a little stain.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but FYI
customer_reviews.text: Alright, product is great, whoever is shipping the product should be a little mindful of the spray nozzle. Mine stopped working after a couple pumps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray. I use it everyday. It leaves my hair feeling and smelling good.
customer_reviews.author: Latosha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the seller.... And product. I use this on my girls braids.... It stops the itching
customer_reviews.author: tracey a

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product it helped by scalp no end while wearing braids this time
customer_reviews.author: Pearlene

customer_reviews.title: Shipped really fast
customer_reviews.text: Shipped really fast! smells nice and it's not sticky at all... Gives your hair a nice shine I'm always a happy customer when I buy at Pharmapacks sellers
customer_reviews.author: ❄Snow Angel ❄

customer_reviews.title: No shine or frizz control
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this spray. I had braids in my hair and was looking for shine with no frizzing. This product did neither. My hair started frizzing and my braids had no shine. I had to use oil to add shine. I have natural hair so when I took my braids out it took 2 times for me to get my hair straighten out because of all the frizz.
customer_reviews.author: queenvictoria39

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: This is the only spray I prefer to use on my hair when I have braids. Plus I like the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Cotton Candy

product_meta.title: African Pride Braid Sheen Extra Spray, 12 Ounce
product_meta.description: African Pride Braid Sheen Hair Spray, Extra Shine Promotes strong, healthy, shiny hairGreat for natural or synthetic hairSoothes itching and drynessSoftens, shines and moisturizes natural or synthetic braids, Excellent for natural and synthetic hair, Soothes itching and dryness, Holds braid tighter and longer hair, Relieves frizzes and breakage, Softens, shines and moisturizes and conditions.
feature_bullets: Great for natural or synthetic hair
Helps to promotes strong, healthy and shiny hair.
